description: I am a mechanical engineer by education, a programmer by profession, and by passion. For ten years, I led a team producing metal parts as a production manager. For over three years, I have been developing in the fascinating world of programming. I specialize in frontend technologies, in which I have over two years of commercial experience. I am advancing my career with the goal of becoming a full-stack developer. In my free time, I play football, run, hike, and read books, preferably on geopolitics and personal development
